transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Good morning, Srishti is speaking from IndiaMART.
Executive: Haanji.
Customer: Haanji. Haanji. Wo aap se kal sari cheeze discussion hua tha jo, wo add wagera aa gaya?
Customer: Ek minute madam, ek minute ji, ek minute, ek minute, ek minute madam.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Main karda thonu back call kara.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haanji sir, aawaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Haanji haan, haanji haan.
Executive: Haan, toh main ye bol rahi thi ki aap se wo jo correction aur add ke liye catalog products ki baat hui thi, wo sari cheeze aapne kara di hai?
Customer: Haanji haan, kar raha hai ji baccha.
Executive: Abhi kar rahe hain wo?
Customer: Haanji haan. Kal kal kal aapne by-visit consume ki thi?
Customer: Mujhe lagta hai ki nahi ji, meri baat nahi hui.
Executive: Nahi ki hai na?
Customer: Haanji haan. Sara din aap hi lag gaya ji.
Executive: Haan, kal toh pura din yahi pe hi hote hain. Ek minute madam hold rakhiye ji, ek minute hold rakhiye.
Customer: Haanji madam.
Executive: Haanji aawaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haanji haan haan haan haan.
Executive: Haan, toh yahi puchne ke liye maine call kiya tha sir ki matlab kya chal raha hai abhi kaam waha pe pura ho gaya ya phir abhi nahi hua ya time lagega sari cheeze.
Customer: Mujhe lagta hai wo kar liya kaam toh waise sara takreeban jo hai tha. Te ek toh madam wahi tha mujhe jo na lead wala hai uska clear nahi ho paya ji.
Executive: Kya clear nahi ho paya?
Customer: Bhi lead jaise aapke pata hai kya hai madam, ek taraf toh aap batate hain bhi jo lead aati hai wo product ke naam se nahi aati, aapke sir naam se nahi aati, wo hamare yaha se aati hai, tumhare yaha se aati hai ji.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Aapne hame apne daftar mein apne usme ek chota sa kamra de diya ya matlab ki usko ek product rakhne ka hum jariya de diya aapne, Rapid Pharmaceutical aapke usme rakh di humne. Wo aapka jo search karte hain, maan lo usne ki matlab ki computer mein dala bhi mujhe vitamin D chahiye. Wo vitamin D ka jitne bhi aapki companyo ke hain us matlab ki aapki dukaan mein ya aapke daftar mein wo sare open ho jate hain.
Customer: Thik hai ji, par lead toh aapke paas hi aati hai na ji?
Executive: Sir lead hamare paas nahi aati hai, lead IndiaMART ke portal pe aati hai.
Customer: Haan wo IndiaMART ke portal pe wahi bol raha hu na ji, aap IndiaMART ki taraf se ho wahi bol raha hu main.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Haanji haan.
Executive: Haan toh wo IndiaMART ke portal pe aati hai aur aap log matlab jo use kar rahe hote hain wo log consume karte hain MyBiz wagera sari cheeze.
Customer: Haanji haan haan haan haan.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Ab hame pata kya hai madam aur koi dikkat nahi hai ji.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Jo sahi baat hai wo hamare paas lead hi nahi aati ji. Wahi aapko keh rahe hain.
Executive: Sir aap usme kar rahe hain.
Customer: Aap usme kar rahe hain, pehle bhi kiya uska koi fark nahi padega jab tak sahi lead aap hum matlab ki hum tak nahi pahunchegi.
Executive: Hmm nahi obviously sir wo toh hai hi.
Customer: Aap chahe kuch keh do wo mere matlab ki aap wo cheeze maan nahi rahe, ho sakta hai main nahi kehta iske bare mein ho main nahi kehta bhi na, ho sakta hai aapki aapko bhi iske bare mein knowledge na ho par jo mera survey hua hai, mera teen mahine ke sath aapke sath link hai, jo mera dusri companyo ke sath link bana hai wo aise hai bhi hame jis hisab se lead di hai gayi hai aap dekhoge na 200 matlab ki maan lo lead li hai humne. Te aap aise nahi keh sakte Delhi wali li hai, humne jo total matlab ki all India ki uthai hai kyuki baccho ko sikhane ke liye kuch bhi karne ke liye hamare product itne the sara kuch humne wo uthai hai. Aapki tarah jab aap bol rahe hain bhi jis taraf se matlab ki aapne rajya ki uthai hai wo aapko portal khul gaya par hamara portal koi bhi nahi khola.
Customer: Hamara jo portal hai hamare paas agar maan lo na.
Customer: Store karwai hai.
Customer: Te usko mano maan lo na koi chatri aaya maan lo te jaha uska koi matlab ki kya batau maan lo te wo laga hota hai wo jab khula hoga waha se sari aa jayegi ji. Hamare wala jo portal hai wo band kiya hua hai bas.
Executive: Sir band nahi kar sakte hain isme aap ye toh samjho. Hum kisi ko personally na toh by-lead share karte hain, na hi hum personally unse by-lead le sakte hain. Aisa nahi hai hamare haath mein ki hum personally jaake har product har matlab har platform pe matlab sabke alag alag system pe hum by-lead dete hain aisa nahi hai. IndiaMART ke portal pe by-lead aati hai sir aur wo har koi consume karta hai. Ab ek shop hai thik hai, aap jaoge aap waha se.
Customer: Aap bol rahe hain na ji portal, hame portal toh dikha hi nahi deta, portal pe bas jo hamara kehne ka maksad hai.
Executive: Sir aap jis company ke bare mein aap bata rahe ho na kal bhi aap bata rahe the ye cheez.
Customer: Nahi nahi uske bare mein nahi bata rahe usko chhodo sare matlab ki ek nahi hai, meri kam se kam 15 companyo se baat hui hui hai.
Executive: Sir aap mujhe ek company ka naam bata dijiye usme se sirf ek company ka naam bata dijiye.
Customer: Madam meri baat toh suno.
Executive: Aise hi.
Customer: Madam meri baat toh suno na ji main wo nahi kehta, hamara kehne ka maksad hai jo IndiaMART ka portal hai wo toh humne dikhna chahiye na hum aur nahi kuch chahte. Hame IndiaMART ka portal jo liya hua hai hame IndiaMART ka portal dikhe hum usme se ek lead le le bas ji.
Executive: Sir by-lead jo hai wo usi se include hai.
Customer: Madam aa nahi rahi chahe aap kuch keh do ji. Hame kuch bana do kuch apne farzi kuch boli chalo sade kole ye cheez nahi aandi ji. Ho sakta main thonu kaha thonu ede bare knowledge na hove main tusi kahoge sanu ae kehnda bilkul saaf sabda de vich sade kole lead nahi aa rahi ji. Sadi lead jedi hai gi aa jamai khatam kiti payi aa wo band kiti hui hai ji bas. Sade kole hor koi baad wala issue alag aa sade wala jeda issue aa sanu wo dasso ji phir aap.
Tusi dekho na ji teen mahine da thode naal baat paya hoya sada ji. Teen mahine de vich sanu dass do bhi thode kole aa lead chajj di aayi hai ji.
Customer: Thode kole hai na madam dass kya.
Customer: Tusi kahoge ae aa meri gal toh suno na ji. Tusi kalla thoda nahi sada nuksan ho reha 12 chok 48 4000 rupaye ya 3000 rupaye mahine da jeda 50000 rupaye da asi bande rakhe hoye ne ji mahine de 1.5 lakh sada ho gaya ji. Jeda teen mahine di expiry langh gayi ji teen mahine da 50 lakh rupaye da laya hoya ji wo sada gaya ji asi dasso kithe jawange ji madam.
Customer: 1.5 lakh rupaye da ta labour thonu pata hi hai na ji bacche kise de bhi aa wo pae gaye kharche kya. Thonu bhi pata bhi wo ae ta hai nahi ga bhi aapan nu na kaam nahi aaya bhi lenge nahi kya ji. Aapan nu ta bacche uddan hi rakhne padde ne na hear karne painde ne ji.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haanji haanji sir.
Executive: Haan ya hame batao bhi hum galat keh rahe hain koi.
Customer: Jede teen bacche ne asi hear kite hoye ne bacche di chuttiya marwaiya ne thonu odi pay dikha dena ji. Lakh rupaye mahine di aa odi pay katti gayi ji. Do mahineya di kya asi chuttiya marwaiya ne giya chuttiya dende nahi si without pay chutti leti hai ji. Hun thonu ki kahiye ji kam matlab ki start karan waste bahut kuch karna painda. Je sade naal ehi haal reha odi 10 lakh rupaye di matlab ki 12 lakh 11 pata nahi 12 lakh rupaye tankha ji asi wo katwa rahe aa. Udu baad fer sada loss reh gaya ji sach ta mare jawange ji gal ta ehe aa madam gal ta ehe aa. Aiddi vaddi asi firm nahi hege bhi asi sambhlange ji.
Customer: Lakh rupaye bacche da ta ek da hi pae gaya sada jeda teen baccheya da hor aa tankha matlab ki kiraya painda makan wo painda ga bijli da bill painda mobila de kharche painde ne wo painde ne gal ta ehe aa na ji. Tusi wo cheez nu na socho sanu jeda hai ga sanu India da jeda portal aa sanu wo davoga.
Customer: Asi IndiaMART de portal te kam kita sanu IndiaMART da portal de do bas.
Executive: Haanji sir.
Customer: Gal ta ehe ya sanu dasso bhi thodiya aa leeda aaiya huiya ne asi maan lange ji.
Customer: Teen mahine ho gaye na ji.
Customer: Sada ta maksad ehe aa hor ta.
Customer: Sada hor ta koi issue nahi na ji. Sada kise prati aive kahiye kya.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai.
Customer: Haan. Bas phir madam phir. Haanji sir. Thik hai ji thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving quality buyleads.

- Wants IndiaMART portal to be functional.

- States financial losses due to lack of leads.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how buyleads are generated.

- Executive clarified IndiaMART's by-lead sharing process.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, portal, subscription, financial loss
